Forty child , age 4 12 year , recruit randomized one two group . Group A receive BTX . Group B receive placebo injection . Participants assess begin trial Weeks 3 , 8 , 12 , 24 . Assessments include quantitative electromyographic kinesiology measurement , electromechanical measurement joint torque across ankle joint use Spasticity Measurement System , Gross Motor Function Measure , physical exam parameter , energy expenditure use Energy Cost Index , kinematic gait analysis , Canadian Occupational Performance Measure . Participants follow total 6 month . Participants initially randomize Group B opportunity BTX treatment 24 week .
